paragraph.paragraph:
To delete a set of measures, you must have
20_saving_a_measure.xml saved some of them previously. Recorded measures are displayed in the multi column list. Here is an example of a non-empty multi column list:

list.item: Select a row (or a set of rows using SHIFT or CTRL keys) from the multi column list.

Click on the
/tools/eiffelstudio/reference/60_metric_tool/metric_toolbar.xmldelete delete/images/eiffelstudio/icons/icon_delete_measure_color.gif button. Selected row (s) will disappear from both multi column list and from the recording file located in the "Metrics" sub folder of the current project.

paragraph.warning: Caution: Delete operation is not undoable!
